title: Thursday afternoon news briefing: Boris Johnson and Leo Varadkar 'see a pathway to a possible deal' after talks in the Wirral
text:
Diplomat row: Trump's secret briefing notes reveal wife's fate

Donald Trump's secret briefing notes appear to have revealed the wife of the US intelligence agent embroiled in a diplomatic immunity row will not return to the UK. The president had pledged to "find a way forward" after a British boy was killed in a car crash allegedly involving the wife of an American diplomat. During a phone call with Boris Johnson on Wednesday, Mr Trump said he was committed to finding a solution as soon as possible following the death of Harry Dunn and wished to send his condolences to the family. But photographs taken of the president's briefing notes at a press event seem to tell a different story.

Design revealed of new £20 banknote featuring JMW Turner

The design of the new £20 banknote, featuring painter JMW Turner, has been revealed by the Bank of England. The new polymer banknote will launch on Feb 20, 2020, and will join the existing Winston Churchill £5 note and the Jane Austen £10 note, which were launched in 2016 and 2017 respectively. Watch a video showing the new note's blue and gold design, which depicts the Margate lighthouse and Turner Contemporary gallery, also located in Margate, the Kent seaside town where the artist drew much of his inspiration. And here is how to spot if your Turner £20 note is worth thousands once they are released.

News digest

Video: Blind Paralympian climbs onto plane roof

A blind Paralympian has climbed onto the roof of a British Airways plane at London City Airport as part of Extinction Rebellion's protests. James Brown, a partially-sighted former cyclist who won a bronze medal at the London 2012 Games, managed to get himself onto the aircraft this afternoon. It comes after a flight from the same airport was grounded this morning when an activist boarded a plane under the guise of a passenger. Read on for details.
